1. IntroductionIntroduction 
Quantum Key Distribution (QKD) became aQuantum Key Distribution (QKD) became a topic of high relevance when the scientific topic of high relevance when the scientific community realised the potential of the upcoming quantum computers. Nowadays community realised the potential of the upcoming quantum computers. Nowadays cryptography mechanisms rely on the complexity of mathematical factorization cryptography mechanisms rely on the complexity of mathematical factorization problems, that would take years to be solved by a genericproblems, that would take years to be solved by a generic computer [Sharma 2019]. computer [Sharma 2019].
